title: operating system
description: The os object contains information elements related to Operating Systems.

name.title: name
name.description: The full name of the operating system. This may include codename and version.

category.title: category
category.description: The category of the operating system.

distro.title: distribution
distro.description: The distribution of the operating system. This is a subcategory of os.category.

codename.title: codename
codename.description: The common codename for a release of an OS distrobution.

version.title: version
version.description: The version of the operating system.

kernel.title: kernel version
kernel.description: The version of the kernel used by the operating system.

arch.title: architecture
arch.description: The processor architecture for which the operating system is compliled.
